name: clang-format
description: Use Clang-Format in Visual Studio Code

clang-format.style.description: clang-format style.(-style=value, value can be file, LLVM, Google, Chromium, Mozilla, WebKit or json configure)

clang-format.fallbackStyle.description: clang-format fallback style.(-fallback-style=value, value can be none, LLVM, Google, Chromium, Mozilla, WebKit)
